Text: most of the stuff in this book was written before the era of computers we have now (and rewritten by people in the government, and probably ok'ed by some committee) before it ever got into the users hand. on this book i would like to see a history on the background of the book you are feeding us, so i can make a decision of whether or not this is undoctored.

This book was originally written by William Powell in 1971 as a protest against the American government. He converted to Christianity and tried to remove it from circulation. Since that time, the book has been "updated" by several sources including one person with the alias "Jolly Roger". What more would you like to know?
